description:
Shimokoube Ryouhei is the dwarf-sized researcher who created Maron`s costume. Before he knew the idol was a girl, he created a http://anidb.net/a1518 [Patlabor]-esque robot, which he later gave to the Demon Seed. He is very arrogant and proud of his work, soon becoming disgusted when Maron is converted into a singer instead of a fighter.
Wikipedia
name: Shimokoube Ryouhei
